tokens.name: LURKO / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:

- **Volatility:** +18.2% price change (medium volatility) → Limit at -3% (mid-range of -2% to -5%).  
- **Volume:** $34k (medium volume) → TP at +15% (mid-range of +10% to +20%).  
- **Stop Loss:** Medium volatility → SL at -10% (mid-range of -8% to -15%).  
- **Time Frame:** Medium volatility + stable momentum → 1h (mid-range of 30min to 2h).  
- **Flow Momentum:** Stable → No aggressive adjustments, standard parameters applied.
